name: Say Again?
description: Say Again? seeks to explore consequential engagement with NPCs through a focus on meaningful conversation, robust ambience and palpable characterization. Taking place over dinner in the family's somber dining room, Say Again? unapologetically embeds the player into the lives of Mom, Dad, and Alex and leaves them the agency to discover, dismiss, or fuel the chaos held clumsily under wraps in this familial dynamic.
